alert.note: Alert for Craig; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 8:58PM CDT until September 05 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... West central Ottawa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 857 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of White Oak to 4 miles north of Vinita, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Vinita... Welch... Bluejacket... Hollow... Pyramid Corners... Centralia... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
